column6: Northstar and Aurora are back! Awoken by a mysterious new threat, the twins have been let loose in the Xavier Mansion, leaving a path way of destruction and death. Their mission: Kill Sabretooth! Part 3 (of 6)!
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Antonio Fabela | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Tim Townsend
